message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product. I think you'll really appreciate its value and I'm confident you'll find it a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to commit to a maximum of $950000 for this purchase.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $1100000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm glad to hear you're open to discussing a price closer to my budget. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $1050000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'd like to propose a slight adjustment to ensure we're both satisfied with the deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1075000. I believe this price still reflects the value of the product and I'm confident you'll find it a fair offer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $1060000 for the product.
